text: aur jab hamane kaha tha, "is bastee mein pravesh karo phir usamen se jahaan se chaaho jee bhar khao, aur bastee ke dvaar mein sajadaaguzaar banakar pravesh karo aur kaho, "chhoot hain." ham tumhaaree khataon ko kshama kar denge aur achchhe se achchha kaam karanevaalon par ham aur adhik anugrah karenge.
